name: part_008
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY2】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment HoneyWorks stage DAY2【チラ見せ】 [XuQm_HL2ntg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Montage of fan messages and illustrations for hololive 5th fes. 'Capture the Moment'.
Important safety and conduct information for visitors displayed in Japanese and English.
Showcase of official merchandise including T-shirts, towels, and penlights.
Information regarding the sales period for official event goods.
Continued montage of heartfelt fan messages and artwork from the community.

subtitles.original: Official Hashtag #hololivefesEXPO24_DAY2 The concert will be starting soon.
subtitles.english: Official Hashtag #hololivefesEXPO24_DAY2 The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上 照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: 声出し応援 OK です
hololive SUPER EXPO 2024 & hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment オフィシャルグッズ
